Class ProjectUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • ProjectUtils

  • public class ProjectUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class has the general utilities that the project needs. Like to read input from the user and print something on the screen. Also it contains the methods that manage the individual options inside the main menu, operations on numbers menu and operations on strings menu.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ProjectUtils()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void computeAverageOfNumbers()
      This method operates how the option compute a average of a list of numbers is going to be carried away.
      static void formatAString()
      This method operates how the option format a string is going to be carried away.
      static void operationsOnNumbers()
      This method creates a NumbersMenuManager object and also applies the method run to it.
      static void operationsOnStrings()
      This method creates a StringMenuManager object and also applies the method run to it.
      static void print(java.lang.String str)
      This method prints the string past as a argument without a new line.

      This method prints the string past as a argument with a new line.

      This method operates how the option process a quadratic equation is going to be carried away.

      This method repeats a character a determined number of times.
      static void reverseAString()
      This method operates how the option reverse a string is going to be carried away.
      static void showStatistics()
      This method adds the strings that are going to be displayed on the Statistics table and displays it.
